name: House of Ninjas
summary: A family of ninjas struggles to protect their legacy while navigating modern life, action, and deep family bonds.
cast: Masi Oka, Vivienne Tseng, James Hiroyuki Liao, Shannon Dang, Aaron Takahashi

name: Supacell
summary: Five Black South Londoners gain superpowers and unite to protect loved ones from a secretive organization.
cast: Tosin Cole, Adelayo Adedayo, Eric Kofi-Abrefa, Nadine Mills, Josh Tedeku.

name: Baby Reindeer
summary: A comedian's life unravels as he navigates the psychological aftermath of being stalked by a pub patron.
cast: Richard Gadd, Jessica Gunning, Nava Mau, Tom Goodman-Hill.

name: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows â€“ Part 2 (2011)
summary: A young wizard, Harry Potter, battles dark forces at Hogwarts, uncovering secrets, forging friendships, and confronting Voldemort to save magic
cast: Daniel Radcliffe, Emma Watson, Rupert Grint, Ralph Fiennes, Alan Rickman.
watch_url: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2

name: American Nightmare
summary: A gripping true-crime docuseries examining the 2015 kidnapping of Denise Huskins and the ensuing media frenzy.
cast: Denise Huskins, Aaron Quinn, Amy Morton, Dan Russo, Doug Rappaport.

name: One Day
summary: Chronicles a 20-year relationship between two opposites, meeting annually to explore love, loss, and growth.
cast: Ambika Mod, Leo Woodall, Eleanor Tomlinson, Essie Davis, Tim McInnerny.
